title: The Empty seas
creator_credit: Henri Fabiani, James Carr and World Wide Pictures
brief_description: Camaret, on the coast of Brittany, relies on lobster fishing and boat building for its livelihood. However, some areas are being fished out and the industry is dying. Shows the continued, and often unrewarded, toil of the men on one of the lobster boats, whose search extends as far as South America and Mauritania.
